My name is Lucas Correia Cruz and I'm a Statistician who is passionate about building graphics and data. I like to learn something new every day. I living in Brazil, Rio de Janeiro.

- üå± My goal is to be a the best in data science and statistic
- üìö Undergraduate in Statistics at the State University of Rio de Janeiro
- üíª I took some courses at Udemy and Data Science Academy
- üòç My hobbies are play games, build graphics and watch WSL, NBA, F1 and E-Sports.
- üíå Contact me at [lucasccrj@hotmail.com](mailto:lucasccrj@hotmail.com).
